name: The Startup: Be The Boss And Make Them Work!
name_original: The Startup: Be The Boss And Make Them Work!
description:
A fun game that helps you concentrate on issues needed to be taken seriously in real life at work
As any startup you start from the bottom. Cheap workforce, poor office, low wages, and small achievements.
Any staff is lazy. Make sure that they are working not sneaking away from it and yet do no be too harsh on them coz exhausted staff can do drastic things
Use the survival mode to beat the charts in Game Center!
Complete levels. Earn more money. Change office. Become a millionaire!
